CustomField.description: NICC-024137 ***THIS FIELD IS DISPLAYED IN THE PARTNER COMMUNITY*** Originally created to display the name of the phone number of the primary contact that the Amadeus Hospitality Partner should contact. This allows the Partner Community users to see the Customer Contact Phone without giving them access to the Contact object.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The phone number of the Customer Contact
CustomField.label: Customer Contact Phone
